amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for Community Oriented Policing Services.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for the U.S. Trustee System Fund, the Community Oriented Policing Services (COPS) program and for grants to upgrade criminal records, as authorized under the Crime Identification Technology Act of 1998 (42 U.S.C. 14601).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boswell amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
